results.title: He = On
results.brief_description: Animated film about a man’s desire to get away from his nagging wife using alcohol as his ploy. Black humour with adult themes.

results.title: Hayburners
results.creator_credit: Tom Robertson and Multi Media Productions
results.brief_description: Young Will Bennett has been assigned a steer to raise and to groom for a 4H club contest, but he is sadly disappointed in the “Hayburner” he has ended up with. A middle-aged retarded helper named Joe enters the scene and sees promise in the animal. Together Will and Joe work to win with Mickey. Based on the novel by Gene Smith.

results.title: Hawaii: the possible dream
results.creator_credit: E McGlone and Cate and McGlone Films
results.brief_description: A tourist eye-view of the islands comprising the Hawaiian chain. Beginning with the famed Waikiki Beach at Honolulu, on the island of Oahu, the varied tourist attractions are visited on Kauai - the Garden Island, Maui - the Valley Island and Hawaii - the Orchid Island, also famed for its extinct and erupting volcanoes.

results.title: Hawaii calls
results.creator_credit: T.W. Cate and Cate and McGlone Films
results.brief_description: Provides a good historical background and shows the great variety of scenery, fine hotels and Polynesian hospitality, together with the spirit of “Aloha” which make the Hawaiian Islands an ideal place for a holiday. Includes the many activities available to the tourists on the different islands - sports, night life, or just lazing in the sun.

results.title: Have You Ever Thought?
results.creator_credit: Doreen Bentley and Christian Myles Productions
results.brief_description: A short documentary about the lives and the work of the Pastorelle Sisters, an order of Nuns in Thornbury, Melbourne. Their lives are centred around the person and teaching of Jesus, lived out in small communities, deeply concerned about the life of people, and working with clergy and laity in the building up of Christian communities.

results.title: Have a heart
results.creator_credit: Kaye Dyal, Ken Plotin, Saul Rubin and Tantalus Films
results.brief_description: Describes the function of the heart and circulatory system and emphasises the need for a healthy lifestyle to prevent heart disease. A heart attack victim is shown being given electric shock treatment. Suitable for lower secondary level.

results.title: Harvesting the snows
results.brief_description: Surveys the Snowy Mountains Scheme - largest engineering project ever undertaken in Australia at the time. Outlines the plan for diverting the waters of the Snowy to the Murray. Shows the Guthega Dam and power station; construction in the Guthega Munyang tunnel; the plan for the [new] Adaminaby Dam and early stages of its construction.

results.title: Hardy Wilson: a living memory
results.brief_description: Hardy Wilson was an Australian architect and artist who acknowledged a climate that was non-European and designed houses and commercial buildings which were sympathetic to their surroundings. He was also a watercolourist, furniture designer, and a prolific social and philosophical writer. This film is of interest to an audience interested in Australian heritage and culture.

results.title: Hard work
results.brief_description: A film about Margo St. James and her fight to have prostitution decriminalized. Revolving around the Hooker’s Convention in Washington, D.C., the action takes place over a five-day period. It includes a visit to the Women’s Detention Center, TV and press interviews, a congressional cocktail party, the Hooker’s Ball and a sunrise walk around the White House. It is not a didactic study on the problem of prostitution but a thought and discussion-provoking vehicle that probes the moral and social values involved.

results.title: Hard brought up: child welfare story
results.brief_description: Shows public services available in one US community for answering social problems. When two boys rob a service station, they are brought before the juvenile court. A social worker investigates their family circumstances.
